E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 9/8/1989
Subject: Progress of Eddie Perez
Dear Sir,
Eddie Perez has an AVG of .290 at A Peoria Chiefs!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 9/9/1989
Subject: Well...
I am rather upset that I do not play regularly.
I wish to be traded if that doesn't change!

Regards,
Mike Young



Date: Monday, 9/22/1989
Subject: Progress of Denny Hocking
Dear Sir,
Denny Hocking is hitting the ball well at A Peoria Chiefs!
He has an AVG of .307, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 10/8/1989
Subject: Bryn Smith healing process
Bryn Smith is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Friday, 10/10/1989
Subject: Ralph Bryant
Ralph Bryant is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor
